messages.messageBody:
-=-I subscribe to the blog Quantum Learning and today's post reminded
me of how often fear is mentioned as a factor in making unschooling
difficult when starting out. At first I was confused by the article,
thinking Why would you want to live with fear?, but as I read it, I
started to understand the tone. It's a very good summary of the
different ways we can be fearful, often unconsciously, and why doing
these things is hurtful.-=-

This one, I'm guessing:

http://www.quantumlearning.pl/

There are other Quantum Learning blogs and sites I saw, but that one
has an article on fearfulness.

Sandra

messages.subject: living with fear blog post
messages.msgSnippet: I subscribe to the blog Quantum Learning and today s post reminded me of how often fear is mentioned as a factor in making unschooling difficult when starting
messages.messageBody:
I subscribe to the blog Quantum Learning and today's post reminded me of how often fear is mentioned as a factor in making unschooling difficult when starting out. At first I was confused by the article, thinking Why would you want to live with fear?, but as I read it, I started to understand the tone. It's a very good summary of the different ways we can be fearful, often unconsciously, and why doing these things is hurtful.

Michele, mom of Rhiannon 8, Caroline 6, and Ian 3
Learning, Laughing, Snuggling, Scrapping
My Digital Scrapbook Pages




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
